title: Competition: Born Gold Vinyl Giveaway w/ Crash Symbols
content:
When Born Gold hooked up with Crash Symbols to produce the wonderfully frenetic Bodysongs, it was always going to be a match made in psychedelic heaven. One of the slickest labels around combining with the most exciting act to come out of that part of the world in recent years; you couldn’t really ask for much more. With rave reviews across the board, Born Gold’s infectious brand of quirky electro-indie is spreading like wildfire. To celebrate the release of Bodysongs, our good friends over at Crash Symbols have kindly offered us a copy of the album on gorgeous 12″ vinyl to give away to one lucky fan. To enter, simply make sure that you are a fan of Crash Symbols and Crack in the Road on Facebook, then leave a comment below (either in the Facebook comment box or the general box), telling us what your favourite track from Bodysongs is!

Check out a couple of personal favourites below, and head over to the Crash Symbols bandcamp to get Bodysongs in digital or vinyl format.

The competition will close on the Wednesday 18 October at 22:00 GMT, and the winner will be picked randomly and notified via Facebook. Postage will be covered, and the competition is open to residents of any country!
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
